name: src/Leaflet.TOC.Control.js
src/Leaflet.TOC.MapServerParser-old.js
MapServerParser
description: Parses the layer data served by an ArcGIS MapServer

params.name: url
params.description: A valid and reachable ArcGIS MapServer URL

params.name: map
params.description:
A Leaflet Map object, which will be passed to all
the layers in the resulting LayerHierarchy

name: constructor
description: Initializes the parser with the given parameters

params.name: url
params.description: A valid and reachable ArcGIS MapServer URL

params.name: map
params.description:
A Leaflet Map object, which will be passed to all
the layers in the resulting LayerHierarchy

params.name: options.data
params.description:
The configuration options related to what data
should be parsed from the MapServer to be included on NestedLayer objects

params.name: options.data.scale
params.description:
Include minZoom and maxZoom
parameters on the NestedLayer

params.name: options.data.defaultVisibility
params.description:
Include the
initial selected state of the NestedLayer

params.name: options.hierarchyOptions
params.description:
The configuration options
the NestedHierarchy takes on instantiation

name: _queryLayers
description: Queries the layers endpoint of the MapServer for layer data.

src/Leaflet.TOC.MapSymbol.js
src/Leaflet.TOC.MapSymbology.js
src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedDynamicMapLayer.js

src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedLayer.js
generateID
description:
Generate a ID number guaranteed to be unique.
IDs are composed of a pseudorandom 4-digit number suffixed by an incrementing counter.

name: NestedLayer
description:
Wraps a Leaflet Layer to allow that layer to be the "parent" of other layers by having
"child" layers

params.name: layerID
params.description: ID of the layer on the origin.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the layer on the origin; display-friendly

name: layerID
description: Layer ID as specified by the server

name: minZoom
description: Minimum zoom level for this layer to be visible

name: maxZoom
description: Maximum zoom level for this layer to be visible

name: id
description: Unique ID generated for each NestedLayer

name: enabled
description: Whether the user may freely toggle this layer on and off

name: src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedLayerTreeHelper.js
applyStateChangeToTree
description: Applies a state change (or changes) to a tree or substree

params.name: change
params.description: A key/value pair of state changes to apply to each layer in the tree
